channel.title: Tools on Lovetoautomate.it - Sander de Groot - Nomadic Software Engineer

item.title: Logging without compromising on detail or performance
item.description: Application logging. Have you ever had to choose between detailled logging or performance? Where you on one side wanted to log something on a certain level of detail while you knew that this would have an enormous impact on the performance of your application? This is exactly the situation I was in while working on some high-load services at Twyp.
